>
[Rime Jar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2422)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 77

**Price** 175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Magical reagents slosh inside this rime-frosted pottery jar the size of a human head. Despite appearing to be rimed in hoarfrost, the jar is warm to the touch. Ilverani wizards create _rime jars_ to sustain themselves during the coldest winter nights.

**Activate** <actions string="Three Actions" /> Interact;     **Effect** The jar draws off the cold and warms your body. If you have the [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) condition caused by exposure to [environmental cold](/Rules.aspx?ID=642), it removes the condition. For 8 hours after applying the rime, you treat extreme cold as severe cold.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
